title: Cosmic Dawn Rakan Recall Animation Bug

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Please give back the Star Particles for  Rakan's recall with this skin. During his recall he used to touch the sun and it would emit a purple cloud of stars. But ever since patch 7.9 they fixed other things about his skin and forgot to add the particles back. I would love to have it back and it would make this skin fantastic again! {{champion:497}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey Chrisgopher! 

Thanks for the report! I really appreciate the gif! ^-^ You're absolutely correct, the purple particles should be part of the recall, and must have fallen off! I've gone ahead and logged a bug ticket for it, and I'll be catching up with the VFX artist this morning so we can hopefully get a fix in for next patch! :)

Thank so much, I appreciate this being done. I love this skin to death and I am so thankful that this skin will become legendary again!!!!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Of course! The VFX artist checked in a fix yesterday, so it's looking like this will be fixed up again next patch!
